titles.title: A bill to amend section 4101(f) of title 38, United States Code, with respect to the designation of certain Veterans' Administration outpatient clinics as centers of geriatric research, education, and clinical activities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law to permit the designation of certain Veterans Administration outpatient clinics as centers of geriatric research, education, and clinical activities.
